item.title: Furrow lane not sweep for one week., 7th November
item.description:
The resident at Flat 11 on Furrow lane continuously dumps a bag of rubbish on Furrow lane EVERYDAY!!. Furrow Lane hasn't been sweep by a road sweeper all week.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Furrow Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Nissan Qashqai N-TEC+ CVT in Grey, 7th November
item.description:
This car has been parked in our shared council car park for about 3-6 months and has not moved. It has damage to its bumper and its window has been left open. I have a feeling this car has been stolen/abandoned.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queen Elizabeths Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
